description: Delete a material unit of measure quantity.
permissions: Allowed when MaterialTransactionPolicy.update? passes for the referenced material transaction: admin users; members of the material transaction broker; members of the material supplier; or users who can update the related trip.
side_effects: Destroys associated material transaction inspections on delete and touches the related tender_job_schedule_shift after commit.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required; --confirm must be true to delete.
